entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Edson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:21 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -10.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Edson Airport 2:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -10.3°C
Pressure: 99.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -12.7°C
Wind: SE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:07 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:07 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:07 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
